attributes.action: Adhere to the rehabilitation of offenders act 1974 regarding the licencing of security officers and door supervisors criminality checks for JUVENILES!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The security industry authority are not giving fair chances to persons,in particular juveniles to obtain a licence under the provisions of the rehabilitation of offenders act 1974.Although there is an exemption I feel that juvenile convictions if deemed spent should be disregarded in determining the suitability of the applicant.Kids are kids and adults are adults.Kids are more likely to get a criminal record in there teens more than a mature responsible adult who should know better.
